text:
Fish would have fun hanging out with them also...

especially if he and Phillipe played checkers together

text: A comment left by ssddr was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by howl, Judy, mattylite)

name: shmuckeles
text: yeah i think wigu and phillipe should definitely never meet because Topato would get hella jealous and beat phillipe with a million punches. sorry, little guy

name: pettytyrant
text: Every time anyone mentions Wigu I think of Wagyu beef.

name: overmedicated
text: I fold

name: fidget
text: it is like calvinball, but with more sadistic forced dancing.

name: clockworkorange
text: I recall there being quite a bit of sadistic forced dancing in calvinball.

name: fidget
text: you must play a different version than I do.

name: quantumcasaba
text:
I blew it (He's sorry)
I knew it (So sorry)

(Just don't do it anymore you scurvy scalawag)

name: gouldgonewild
text: Fuck, that brought me back

name: irondave
text: I too was reminded of Calvinball.

name: rowboat
text: Well, I just got done shitting on all the guest strips in my last post (except the Kochalka! It is important that I stress that always!) and now I will eat that shit because this one is rad. Rowland nails the Achewood essence and still manages to tastefully inject enough of himself to make it his own. THIS SHIT THAT I'M EATING TASTES REALLY BAD!

name: lizard
text: Yeah this is actually one of my favourite Achewoods, perversely enough.

name: zapatos
text: If I eat this shit can I please have a steak afterwards

name: gethen
text: Philippe's dialog is spot-on.

name: philosophe
text: Maybe the only color strip that doesn't look terrible?

name: libelandslander
text: Do I remember Onstad doing an Overcompensating guest strip, or is that just a tasty dream?

name: wingspan
text: I don't think that happened....Has Onstad ever done a guest strip for anyone?

name: wingspan
text: Wait, I mean that as a genuine question, not internet asshole sarcasm.  Just wanted to clarify.

name: missbee
text: I don't think so.

name: i_love_kate
text: He did a guest strip for Scary-Go-Round? I think? Or at least a strip featuring Amy, it may have been on this site.

name: wingspan
text: You're right.

name: shoinan
text: Yep, this is a pretty sweet guest strip.

name: friedbeefcake
text:
"Checkers is hard"
"roll the dice"
such humility

name: berami
text: Sad and dancing Phillipe is the sweetest thing ever.

name: random_shorts
text: Lie bot is doing that thing he does.

name: dusty
text: Do you think Lie Bot's nose is a button or a light?

name: origotoshi
text: I always just assumed it was decorative. It looks like it might be a button though. Maybe he works like those old-school Crash Test Dummy toys: Punch him in the nose and his arms and legs pop off.
